Compares the path with the directory entry {{c|rhs}}.

===Parameters===
{{par begin}}
{{par|rhs|directory_entry to compare}}
{{par end}}

===Return value===
@1@ {{c|true}} if {{c|1=path() == rhs.path()}}, {{c|false}} otherwise.
@2@ {{c|true}} if {{c|1=path() != rhs.path()}}, {{c|false}} otherwise.
@3@ {{c|true}} if {{c|1=path() &lt; rhs.path()}}, {{c|false}} otherwise.
@4@ {{c|true}} if {{c|1=path() &lt;= rhs.path()}}, {{c|false}} otherwise.
@5@ {{c|true}} if {{c|1=path() &gt; rhs.path()}}, {{c|false}} otherwise.
@6@ {{c|true}} if {{c|1=path() &gt;= rhs.path()}}, {{c|false}} otherwise.
